verses.text: \w A|strong="H5186"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H6310"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*. \w O|strong="H0241"\w* God, \w the|strong="H5186"\w* heathens \w are|strong="H0241"\w* come into thy inheritance, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H8451"\w* defiled thy holy temple: \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H8451"\w* made Jerusalem as \w a|strong="H5186"\w* place \w to|strong="H6310"\w* keep fruit.

\w They|strong="H6310"\w* have given \w the|strong="H4480"\w* dead bodies \w of|strong="H4480"\w* thy servants \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* meat \w for|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* air: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* flesh \w of|strong="H4480"\w* thy saints \w for|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* poured \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* blood \w as|strong="H0834"\w* water, round \w about|strong="H8085"\w* Jerusalem \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* none \w to|strong="H8085"\w* bury \w them|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w We|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* become \w a|strong="H0834"\w* reproach \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* neighbours: \w a|strong="H0834"\w* scorn \w and|strong="H1121"\w* derision \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* round \w about|strong="H5608"\w* \w us|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0834"\w* long, O Lord, wilt thou \w be|strong="H1121"\w* angry \w for|strong="H3045"\w* ever: \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* thy zeal \w be|strong="H1121"\w* kindled \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* fire?

Pour \w out|strong="H3045"\w* thy wrath upon \w the|strong="H3205"\w* nations \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3205"\w* kingdoms \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* called upon thy name.

Because \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* devoured Jacob; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* waste \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w*.

Remember \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* former iniquities: \w let|strong="H1961"\w* thy mercies speedily prevent us, \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H0854"\w* \w are|strong="H0001"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* exceeding poor.

Help \w us|strong="H3117"\w*, O God, our saviour: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* glory \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy name, O Lord, deliver \w us|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* forgive \w us|strong="H3117"\w* our sins \w for|strong="H3117"\w* thy nameâ€™s sake:

Lest \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w should|strong="H8104"\w* say \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* Gentiles: \w Where|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* made \w known|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* nations \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* eyes, \w By|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* revenging \w the|strong="H8104"\w* blood \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy servants, which hath \w been|strong="H3808"\w* shed:

Let \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sighing \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* prisoners come \w in|strong="H7200"\w* before thee. According \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* greatness \w of|strong="H7200"\w* thy arm, \w take|strong="H7200"\w* possession \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* children \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* put \w to|strong="H7200"\w* death.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* render \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w our|strong="H5048"\w* neighbours sevenfold \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5048"\w* bosom: \w the|strong="H5048"\w* reproach wherewith \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* reproached thee, O Lord.

\w But|strong="H4325"\w* we thy people, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1234"\w* sheep \w of|strong="H4325"\w* thy pasture, \w will|strong="H4325"\w* give thanks \w to|strong="H4325"\w* thee \w for|strong="H4325"\w* ever. We \w will|strong="H4325"\w* shew \w forth|strong="H1234"\w* thy praise, unto generation \w and|strong="H4325"\w* generation.
